cast.overview: The remarkable story of Brazilian racing driver Ayrton Senna, charting his physical and spiritual achievements on the track and off, his quest for perfection, and the mythical status he has since attained, is the subject of Senna, a documentary feature that spans the racing legend's years as an F1 driver, from his opening season in 1984 to his untimely death a decade later.
cast.title: Senna

details.biography: Arnaldo Jabor (Rio de Janeiro, December 12, 1940 – São Paulo, February 15, 2022) was a Brazilian filmmaker, screenwriter, film and TV director, film producer, playwright, critic, journalist and writer. He is most famous in cinema for the making of "All nudity shall be punished" (1973), "I love you" (1981), and "Love me forever or never" (1986).
details.name: Arnaldo Jabor
details.place_of_birth: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
